Creep was a little disappointed.

Creep: Alright, Celeron.... If I must... =
I'll be a good girl and eat
just this one.

In a flash, her arm became a hu=
ge, long claw and she grabbed the
guard, crushing him at the same time. She=
 took him closer to her and
made a drill out of her left arm.

Creep: Worry=
. It will hurt an awful lot.

She started digging the spark out and, in bet=
ween two screams, ate it
in one gulp. The yelling stopped immediately and s=
he seemed to grow
bigger and more ferocious by the moment.

Creep: Okay, Ch=
ief, I'm good to go.
